US->CA.notes: US citizens can visit Canada visa-free for tourism or business purposes. Valid passport required.

US->GB.notes: US citizens can visit the UK visa-free but need an Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) starting January 2025. ETA is valid for 2 years.

US->FR.notes: US citizens can visit France and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->DE.notes: US citizens can visit Germany and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->JP.notes: US citizens can visit Japan visa-free for tourism or business purposes for up to 90 days. Valid passport required.

US->AU.notes: US citizens need an Electronic Travel Authority (ETA) to visit Australia. Apply online through the official ETA app or website.

US->CN.notes: US citizens need a visa to visit China. Apply at a Chinese consulate or embassy. Tourist visas typically allow 30-90 day stays.

US->IN.notes: US citizens need an e-Visa to visit India. Apply online at least 4 days before travel. Tourist e-Visa available for 30 days, 1 year, or 5 years.

US->TH.notes: US citizens can visit Thailand visa-free for up to 30 days. Extensions available at immigration offices.

US->TR.notes: US citizens need an e-Visa to visit Turkey. Apply online at least 48 hours before travel. Valid for 180 days from issue date.

CA->US.notes: Canadian citizens can visit the US visa-free for tourism or business purposes.

GB->US.notes: UK citizens can visit the US visa-free but need an ESTA authorization.

GB->FR.notes: UK citizens can visit France and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days.

AU->US.notes: Australian citizens can visit the US visa-free but need an ESTA authorization.

AU->GB.notes: Australian citizens can visit the UK visa-free for tourism or business purposes.

JP->US.notes: Japanese citizens can visit the US visa-free but need an ESTA authorization.

IN->US.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit the US. Apply at a US embassy or consulate.

IN->GB.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit the UK. Apply online through the UK visa application center.

IN->CA.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Canada. Apply online or at a visa application center.

IN->AU.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Australia. Apply online for an e-Visitor or tourist visa.

IN->FR.notes: Indian citizens need a Schengen visa to visit France and other Schengen countries. Apply at the French embassy or consulate.

IN->DE.notes: Indian citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Germany and other Schengen countries. Apply at the German embassy or consulate.

IN->IT.notes: Indian citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Italy and other Schengen countries. Apply at the Italian embassy or consulate.

IN->ES.notes: Indian citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Spain and other Schengen countries. Apply at the Spanish embassy or consulate.

IN->AE.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit the UAE. E-visa available online or through airlines/hotels.

IN->TH.notes: Indian citizens can visit Thailand with visa on arrival for 15 days. E-visa also available for 30 days.

IN->MY.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Malaysia. E-visa available online through the official portal.

IN->SG.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Singapore. Apply online or at Singapore embassy/consulate.

IN->JP.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Japan. Apply at the Japanese embassy or consulate.

IN->CN.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit China. Apply at a Chinese consulate or embassy.

IN->TR.notes: Indian citizens need an e-Visa to visit Turkey. Apply online before travel.

IN->NZ.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit New Zealand. Apply online through the official portal.

IN->SA.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Saudi Arabia. Apply online for e-visa or at Saudi embassy.

IN->ID.notes: Indian citizens can visit Indonesia with visa on arrival for 30 days.

IN->PH.notes: Indian citizens can visit the Philippines visa-free for 30 days.

IN->KR.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit South Korea. Apply at the Korean embassy or consulate.

IN->PK.notes: Indian citizens need a visa to visit Pakistan. Special application process applies. Apply at Pakistani embassy or consulate.

CN->US.notes: Chinese citizens need a visa to visit the US. Apply at a US embassy or consulate.

BR->US.notes: Brazilian citizens can visit the US visa-free but need an ESTA authorization.

PK->US.duration: Varies by visa type (B1/B2: typically 6 months, can be up to 10 years)
PK->US.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit the US. Tourist/Business visa (B1/B2) requires interview at US embassy/consulate. Processing time varies by location.

PK->GB.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit the UK. Standard Visitor Visa allows tourism, business, or family visits. Apply at UK visa application center and provide biometrics.

PK->CA.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Canada. Tourist visa requires application at visa application center, biometrics collection, and may require interview. Processing time varies.

PK->AU.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Australia. Tourist visa (subclass 600) requires application at Australian embassy or consulate. May require biometrics and additional documents.

PK->FR.notes: Pakistani citizens need a Schengen visa to visit France and other Schengen countries. Apply at the French embassy or consulate. Schengen visa allows travel to all 27 Schengen countries.

PK->DE.notes: Pakistani citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Germany and other Schengen countries. Apply at the German embassy or consulate. Schengen visa allows travel to all 27 Schengen countries.

PK->AE.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit the UAE. Visa can be sponsored by UAE residents or obtained through travel agencies. Apply at UAE embassy or through authorized visa processing centers.

PK->TH.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Thailand. Apply at Thai embassy or consulate. Tourist visa allows 60-day stay, can be extended for 30 days in Thailand.

PK->MY.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Malaysia. Apply at Malaysian embassy or consulate. Processing time and requirements may vary.

PK->TR.notes: Pakistani citizens need an e-Visa to visit Turkey. Apply online at least 48 hours before travel. E-visa valid for 180 days from issue date.

PK->IN.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit India. Special application process with additional documentation required. Apply at Indian embassy or consulate.

PK->CN.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit China. Tourist visa (L visa) requires application at Chinese embassy or consulate. May require invitation letter and travel itinerary.

PK->SG.duration: 30 days (single entry), up to 2 years (multiple entry)
PK->SG.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Singapore. Apply through authorized visa agents or at Singapore embassy/consulate. May require local sponsor or detailed travel itinerary.

PK->JP.notes: Pakistani citizens need a visa to visit Japan. Tourist visa requires application at Japanese embassy or consulate. May require detailed itinerary, hotel bookings, and financial proof.

PK->SA.notes: Pakistani citizens need an e-visa to visit Saudi Arabia. Tourist e-visa available online for eligible travelers. Umrah visa also available through authorized agents. Apply online through official Saudi e-visa portal.

US->BR.notes: US citizens need a visa to visit Brazil (reinstated April 2025). E-visa available online. Valid for 10 years with multiple entries.

US->MX.notes: US citizens can visit Mexico visa-free for up to 180 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->NZ.notes: US citizens need a New Zealand Electronic Travel Authority (NZeTA) to visit. Apply online before travel.

US->SG.notes: US citizens can visit Singapore visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->MY.notes: US citizens can visit Malaysia visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->KR.notes: US citizens can visit South Korea visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->AE.notes: US citizens can visit the UAE visa-free for up to 30 days. Can be extended for additional 30 days.

US->PH.notes: US citizens can visit the Philippines visa-free for up to 30 days for tourism purposes.

US->ID.notes: US citizens can visit Indonesia visa-free for up to 30 days for tourism purposes.

US->AR.notes: US citizens can visit Argentina visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->ZA.notes: US citizens can visit South Africa visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism purposes.

US->PL.notes: US citizens can visit Poland and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->GR.notes: US citizens can visit Greece and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->PT.notes: US citizens can visit Portugal and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->IE.notes: US citizens can visit Ireland visa-free for up to 90 days for tourism or business purposes.

US->CH.notes: US citizens can visit Switzerland and other Schengen countries visa-free for up to 90 days within any 180-day period. ETIAS authorization may be required starting late 2026.

US->RU.notes: US citizens need a visa to visit Russia. Apply at a Russian consulate or embassy. Processing time varies.

PK->IT.notes: Pakistani citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Italy and other Schengen countries. Apply at the Italian embassy or consulate.

PK->ES.notes: Pakistani citizens need a Schengen visa to visit Spain and other Schengen countries. Apply at the Spanish embassy or consulate.
